plot outline: Gnanam" is a Kannada movie that has won laurels across the world. The story revolves around two kids born in a different socio-economic environment. One is a bright kid and the other one is a mentally challenged kid. The lifeline of this film is the harmony that exists between these two kids and how a common cause enables them to work in tandem. The film is set to hit the screens shortly, so be ready to watch this heart-warming film that breaks a lot of social taboos.
title: GNANAM
plot: Gnanam" is a Kannada movie that has won laurels across the world. The story revolves around two kids born in a different socio-economic environment. One is a bright kid and the other one is a mentally challenged kid. The lifeline of this film is the harmony that exists between these two kids and how a common cause enables them to work in tandem. The film is set to hit the screens shortly, so be ready to watch this heart-warming film that breaks a lot of social taboos.::VARADARAJ

Two kids from very different backgrounds, an academically bright student and a mentally challenged child are connected by this harmony that exists between them and a common cause that binds them together and enables them to work in a synchronized manner.::Shrinivas G. Kulkarni
